Fundamentals Bridge Training

Learning Hub

WELCOME

 

WELCOME TO CTI'S BRIDGE TRAINING. WE HAVE MADE SOME CHANGES TO OUR COACHING CURRICULUM THAT WILL IMPACT YOUR COACHING AND YOUR PATH TOWARDS CERTIFICATION WITH CTI.

 

 

 

To begin the course, click a lesson in the menu to the left. At any time,

you may jump to another lesson by selecting it from the menu.

 

 

Use the links at the bottom right to navigate Back or  Next within the course.

 

It is recommended that you proceed through the course as follows:

•         Read every lesson in order, from top to bottom

 

•         Participate in the interactive lessons

 

•         Complete the course by following the directions in the final lesson

 

 

 

Click on the Next button to begin the course
